The gospel is the power of God for salva: All have sinned and fall short of the glory of God.
God demonstrates His love for us in Christ's death.
The gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ.
There is no condemnation for those in Christ Jesus.
All things work together for good to those who love God.
We are more than conquerors through Christ who loved us.
Confess with your mouth, believe in your heart.
Be transformed by renewing your mind.
Overcome evil with good.
Owe no one anything except to love one another.
The kingdom of God is righteousness, peace, and joy.
Accept one another as Christ accepted you.
May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace.
Watch out for those who cause divisions and offenses.
